education: Bachelor's in Political Science, Law, or Public Administration
location: Government offices, administrative services, public sector organizations
description: Works in government administration to implement policies and public services.
roadmap: High School: Focus on History, Political Science, and English
Stay updated on current affairs and government systems
Take introductory courses on public administration or governance
Participate in debates and essay competitions
Pursue Bachelor's in Political Science, Law, or Public Administration
Prepare for civil service exams and internships in government bodies
books_resources: Introduction to Public Administration by Shafritz & Hyde
Online courses on Civil Services preparation
exam_requirement: UPSC Civil Services Exam (Prelims, Mains, Interview)

education: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field
learning_pref: Online courses, college degree, coding bootcamps
description: Designs, develops, and maintains software applications.
roadmap: High School: Focus on Math, Computer Science, and English
Learn basic programming languages like Python or Java
Take part in coding competitions and hackathons
Pursue Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field
Internships in software development
Build portfolio projects and apply for software roles
books_resources: Clean Code by Robert C. Martin
Introduction to Algorithms by Cormen et al.
Online coding platforms like LeetCode and HackerRank
exam_requirement: No mandatory exam, GATE optional (for higher studies/PSU jobs)

education: MBBS, MD, or specialized medical degrees
description: Diagnoses and treats patients, provides medical care and advice.
roadmap: High School: Focus on Biology, Chemistry, and Physics
Prepare for NEET exam
Enroll in MBBS course
Complete internships and residency
Specialize in chosen field (MD/MS/Diploma)

description: Educates students in schools or coaching centers.
roadmap: High School: Focus on relevant subjects
Pursue Bachelor's degree in chosen subject
Complete B.Ed or teacher training
Internships/teaching practice
Apply for teaching positions

education: Bachelor's in Business, Economics, or relevant field
description: Creates and manages businesses, takes risks for growth.
roadmap: High School: Focus on Economics and Mathematics
Learn basics of business and finance
Pursue Bachelor's in Business or Economics
Participate in entrepreneurship workshops and competitions
Start own business or join startup incubators
books_resources: Zero to One by Peter Thiel
average_salary: Variable (₹0 to multi-crore depending on success)

location: Law firms, courts, corporate legal departments
description: Represents clients, provides legal advice, and prepares legal documents.
roadmap: High School: Focus on Political Science, History, and English
Pursue LLB
Internships in law firms or legal departments
Prepare for bar exams
Optional: LLM specialization

description: Manages bank operations, customer relations, and financial services.
roadmap: High School: Focus on Mathematics and Economics
Pursue B.Com or related degree
Obtain finance certifications
Internships in banks or financial institutions
Gain experience and promotions
exam_requirement: IBPS/SBI PO, RBI Grade B, CA/CFA exams

education: Graduation in any stream, NDA, or defense academies
description: Defends the nation, leads troops, and strategizes military operations.
roadmap: High School: Focus on Physical Fitness and academics
Appear for NDA/CDS exams
Join military academy
Complete training and commission
Gain experience through postings

description: Designs and supervises construction projects and infrastructure development.
roadmap: High School: Focus on Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry
Pursue B.Tech/B.E in Civil Engineering
Internships in construction projects
Work on real-world projects
Specialty certifications

education: Bachelor's in Fine Arts, Graphic Design, or Animation
location: Media houses, design studios, advertising agencies
description: Creates visual content for digital and print media.
roadmap: High School: Focus on Art, Design, and Computer Skills
Learn Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop
Pursue Bachelor's in Fine Arts or Graphic Design
Internships in design agencies
Build portfolio and freelance
books_resources: Design Basics by David A. Lauer
exam_requirement: Design school entrance exams (NID, NIFT, private colleges)

description: Operates aircraft transporting passengers or cargo across regions and countries.
roadmap: High School: Focus on Physics and Mathematics
Join a certified flying school
Clear DGCA exams and acquire a Student Pilot License
Log required flying hours and complete CPL training
Get placed in commercial/private airlines
books_resources: Flight Theory for Pilots by Charles E. Dole
exam_requirement: DGCA exams for CPL, Airline selection tests

location: Media houses, news channels, online publications
description: Reports and writes news stories, investigates issues, and informs the public.
roadmap: High School: Focus on English, Social Studies, Current Affairs
Pursue a Bachelor's in Journalism or Mass Comm.
Intern in newspapers, TV, or online media
Build a portfolio of reports
Start working in news agencies or freelancing
books_resources: The Elements of Journalism by Bill Kovach
On Writing Well by William Zinsser
exam_requirement: University entrance tests or direct admission

learning_pref: Online AI courses, coding bootcamps, projects
description: Designs and builds AI systems, machine learning models, and intelligent applications.
roadmap: High School: Focus on Mathematics, Computer Science
Bachelor’s in Computer Science or AI
Learn Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch
Do internships in AI projects
Build ML/AI models and deploy
Work in AI-driven startups or research
books_resources: Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras & TensorFlow

education: Bachelor's in Hotel Management, Tourism Studies
description: Oversees hotel operations, manages staff, ensures guest satisfaction.
roadmap: High School: Focus on English, Business Studies
Bachelor’s in Hotel/ Hospitality Management
Internships in hotels or resorts
Gain experience in front office, F&B, operations
Promote to management roles
books_resources: Introduction to Hospitality by John R. Walker
Hotel Management & Operations by Denney G. Rutherford

description: Studies celestial phenomena, conducts astronomical research, develops theories of the universe.
roadmap: High School: Focus on Math, Physics
Bachelor’s in Physics/Aerospace
Masters/PhD in Astrophysics
Intern/Research at ISRO/NASA/Observatories
Publish scientific papers
books_resources: Astrophysics for People in a Hurry by Neil deGrasse Tyson
